name: StylusPostcssInlineSvg
description: Basic Stylus with PostCSS processors [postcss-inline-svg, autoprefixer, cssnano] and multy CSS files output setup using Grunt
author: Asher Indursky
_comment: npm i -D autoprefixer cssnano grunt grunt-contrib-connect grunt-contrib-stylus grunt-contrib-watch grunt-postcss postcss-inline-svg spritesh svgo
